item.title: Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams
item.description: ### Author: Walker, Matthew loc 45 - Routinely sleeping less than six or seven hours a night demolishes your immune system, more than doubling your risk of loc 45 - Routinely sleeping less than six or seven hours a night demolishes your immune system, more than doubling your risk of cancer. Insufficient sleep is a key lifestyle factor determining whether or not you will develop Alzheimerâ€™s disease.
